title: Gateway National Recreation Area: Other Resources
body: Other Resources       If you are looking for lesson plans and teacher guides, please check out our teacher-created materials and field trips pages!   Â    The following NPS and other educator resources include federal, state and local agencies, environmental and historical education organizations and other sources of valuable information and guidance for teachers in the natural sciences and history. Click on the park unit of interest below for details, or call Geri Kobryn-Blatter at 718-338-3338 ext. 274 for further resources. Jamaica Bay Unit Teacher Resources Staten Island Unit Teacher Resources Sandy Hook Unit Teacher Resources
